price: "Eğer doğru söyleyenlerden isen haydi üzerimize gökten parçalar indir."
arabic: فَأَسۡقِطۡ عَلَيۡنَا كِسَفٗا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: fa-asqiṭ ʿalaynā kisafan mina al-samāi in kunta mina al-ṣādiqīna
